intro.first: As a certified chocolate sommelier and professional chocolatier, I'm the founder of DELICE Creative Chocolate School. My journey began with a simple love for sweets and an old family recipe book.
intro.second: With deep knowledge in neurobiology and nutrition, I combine my passion for quality chocolate with a commitment to healthy living. Today, I serve as a mentor, trainer, and consultant, helping both beginners and professionals master the art of chocolate.

mission.title: My Mission
mission.first: At DELICE, we carefully select ingredients, monitor their quality and freshness, ensuring perfect harmony with recipes and other components. We create chocolates with passion, thinking about the pleasure and moments of delight that await those we serve.
mission.second: As a mother of twins, I especially value the opportunity to share my experience and knowledge, emphasizing the importance of delicious and healthy eating. I'll teach you how to make exquisite chocolates right in your own kitchen.

faq.description: Everything you need to know about DELICE chocolate making courses and masterclasses.

format.question: What is the format of the chocolate making course?
format.answer: The course consists of 4 modules (lessons) of 4-5 hours each or 2 full days. We combine theoretical knowledge with practice in an interactive format. Each lesson includes instructor demonstrations followed by hands-on exercises under guidance.

attention.question: Is individual attention provided during training?
attention.answer: Yes, we give maximum attention to each participant. Training is conducted individually or in small groups of 2-3 people to ensure personalized guidance and support.

experience.question: Is experience required to participate in the course?
experience.answer: No, our course is suitable for both beginners and experienced confectioners. We adapt the program depending on the participants' skill levels.

materials.question: Are materials and ingredients provided?
materials.answer: Yes, all necessary materials and ingredients are provided. You don't need to bring anything with you except the desire to learn and create.

booking.question: How can I book a place on the course?
booking.answer: You can book a place on our website by filling out the registration form. After booking confirmation, you will receive all necessary instructions and information.

practice.question: Will there be an opportunity to practice after the course?
practice.answer: Yes, we provide access to additional materials and recipes for self-practice. You can also sign up for our advanced masterclasses to deepen your knowledge and skills.
